articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: While Swan got their users' funds out of Prime Trust in time, Coinbits has been forced to suspend most of its services.
articles.title: Crypto Firms Swan, Coinbits Disclose Prime Trust Ties as Fallout Continues

articles.description: The firm’s two Ethereum ETFs will now be the first investment vehicles to offer a staking service.
articles.title: Digital Asset Manager 3IQ Adds Ethereum Staking to Two of Its Funds

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Ohio resident Michael Ackerman was charged in 2020 for defrauding victims with a bogus crypto trading algorithm.
articles.title: Ex-Trader Ordered to Pay $54 Million CFTC Fine Over Crypto Fraud

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX  would likely rebrand as part of any restart, according to reports.
articles.title: FTX 'Reboot' Talks Begin and Send FTT Token Soaring 15%

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: That means Bitcoin now has a staggering $590 billion market capitalization.
articles.title: Bitcoin Market Dominance Reaches 58%—Highest Level Since April 2021

articles.description: Daniel Friedberg allegedly helped hold together a “house of cards” at the behest of FTX insiders.
articles.title: FTX Sues Ex-Compliance Chief Over 'Hush Money' Payments

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: REVIEW: Sweet Bitcoin won’t win any awards for originality, but it’s a fun iOS and Android game with real crypto earnings.
articles.title: You Can Now Earn Bitcoin for Playing This Candy Crush Clone

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The company is not shying away from buying “digital gold.” It spent $347 million buying more BTC in the second quarter.
articles.title: MicroStrategy Buys More Bitcoin, Treasury Tops $4.5 Billion

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: "World Flag," an NFT art collection presented by Art Blocks and Pace, also investigates the state of the global fight against climate change.
articles.title: John Gerrard's 'World Flag' Art Blocks Drop Points the Finger at Nationalism

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The program will offer projects working at the intersection of music and the blockchain access to funding, marketing support, and other resources.
articles.title: Warner Music, Polygon Labs Launch Blockchain Music Accelerator

articles.description: The e-commerce giant’s Mercado Pago app will give Mexicans access to digital dollars.
articles.title: Mercado Libre Gives Mexican Customers Access to Pax Dollar Stablecoin

articles.description: The co-founders of Three Arrows Capital, Su Zhu and Kyle Davies, recently formed new VC fund 3AC Ventures.
articles.title: Three Arrows Capital Liquidators Demand $1.3B from Bankrupt VC Fund’s Co-Founders

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The operation, the first of its kind, was made possible thanks to new tools developed by Israeli security agencies.
articles.title: Israel Seizes $1.7M From Crypto Accounts Linked to Iran’s Quds Force, Hezbollah: Report

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces trial after U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan rejected his bid to dismiss most criminal charges.
articles.title: Judge Rejects Sam Bankman-Fried's Bid to Dismiss Criminal Charges Over FTX, Confirms Trial

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The popular adage, Not your Keys, Not your Coins, is making the rounds in the wake of the latest exchange meltdown. But what does it actually mean?
articles.title: Not Your Keys, Not Your Crypto: What to Know Before the Next FTX-type Meltdown

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: “Europe is a massive hub for crypto due to its strict approach to regulation which made the industry flourish,” says Coincub CEO Sergiu Hamza.
articles.title: Which Countries Have the Best Crypto Tax Laws?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The bankrupt crypto exchange holds $500 million in Anthropic shares and is a coveted asset.
articles.title: FTX Halts Sale of $500 Million Stake in AI Startup Anthropic

articles.author: André Beganski,Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Some experts say all financial roads in the U.S., no matter how nascent, eventually lead to Wall Street.
articles.title: Wall Street Is Coming for Crypto—Whether Early Believers Like It or Not

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: After the huge Azuki Elementals drop, the new NFTs are trading under the mint price—and the originals are falling fast.
articles.title: Azuki NFT Floor Plummets as Collectors Blast 'Identical' Elementals Art

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The English Central Bank is looking at a plethora of options for a CBDC it has yet to determine is viable.
articles.title: Bank of England Says ‘Britcoin’ CBDC Might Not Be on a Blockchain

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Nevada regulators are moving to shut down crypto custodian Prime Trust after finding it owed millions to customers.
articles.title: Nevada Forces Crypto Custodian Prime Trust to Shut Down

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: VCs are pouring big money into AI startups, hoping to increase the frequency and velocity of innovation in the industry.
articles.title: These Three AI Startups Just Raised $2 Billion

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Generative AI can help with online research, PDF queries, reminders, and social media searches.
articles.title: These ChatGPT Plugins Can Boost Your Productivity With AI

articles.author: Kade Garrett
articles.description: Web3 embraces the crypto ethos and is designed to be permissionless (no centralized gatekeepers), trustless (no need to place trust in a third party), and open to all (little-to-no censorship of individuals/ideas).
articles.title: What Is Web3? A Decentralized Internet Via Blockchain Technology

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Multi-chain NFT marketplace Magic Eden will support Bitcoin BRC-20 tokens, including new token drops through its launchpad.
articles.title: Magic Eden Dives Deeper Into Bitcoin With BRC-20 Tokens

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: All 10,000 Azuki Elementals NFTs offered for sale were snatched up during the presale, even in a weakened market.
articles.title: Azuki Elementals NFT Drop Yields $38 Million in Just 15 Minutes

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Most people are down for what Web3 promises to offer for a new, decentralized internet, but they aren't familiar with the term itself.
articles.title: Survey Says: Nobody Knows What Web3 Is

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin is up modestly in the past 24 hours but a number of alts are surging.
articles.title: Blur, Pepe Lead Altcoin Action as Bitcoin Settles Above $30K

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Australian human rights activist Drew Pavlou claims that a $50,000 Bitcoin bounty was placed on his mother by the Chinese Communist Party.
articles.title: China Allegedly Offered Bitcoin Bounty to ‘Terminate’ Australian Activist

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: In only a few months of existence, ChatGPT has quickly dominated conversations about AI and risen to international prominence.
articles.title: What is ChatGPT? The AI Natural Language Processing Tool Explained

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Blankos Block Party and NFL Rivals developer remains a unicorn with its latest raise, and it says more funding is in the works.
articles.title: Mythical Games Raises $37 Million as NFL Rivals Tops 1M Downloads

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The EU has reached a political agreement on regulations to safeguard the financial system from “unbacked cryptocurrencies” and strengthen banks.
articles.title: EU Reaches Agreement on Crypto Asset Regulations in Banking

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The presiding judge denied Binance's motion in the case without the U.S. regulator having to defend against it.
articles.title: Binance Motion on SEC’s ‘Misleading’ Public Language Denied

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Jeremy Allaire believes there has been progress in addressing regulatory concerns that have previously hindered the approval of Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S.
articles.title: Circle CEO Optimistic Over Bitcoin Spot ETF Approval: 'Progress is Being Made'

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Policy experts weigh in on calls for a new version of the European Union's Markets in Crypto Assets legislation.
articles.title: As EU’s Landmark Crypto Rules Come Into Force, Do We Already Need MiCA 2.0?

articles.description: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.
articles.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads

articles.description: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.
articles.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche

articles.description: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.
articles.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach

articles.description: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.
articles.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming

articles.description: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.
articles.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming

articles.description: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.
articles.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation

articles.description: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.
articles.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.
articles.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner

articles.description: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.
articles.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler

articles.description: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.
articles.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead

articles.description: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.
articles.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.
articles.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
articles.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.
articles.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
articles.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO

articles.description: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.
articles.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming

articles.description: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.
articles.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
articles.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.
articles.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.
articles.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset
